title: Eaton Democrat
additional-note: Published as the Eaton Semi-Weekly News from 1927 to 1935.  Also previously published as the Preble County Democrat (1857-1859 and 1903-1908) and the Eaton Weekly Democrat (1866-1875); otherwise known as the Eaton Democrat (or just the Democrat) back to 1840. Ceased publication in 1940.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Tim Wells for copyright research on this title.
